'''Luke BarnesÂ '''is a British actor and playwright, having written the plays ''Chapel Street'', ''Bottleneck'' and ''Eisteddfod''. In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' he is playing the role of [[Rast]], and was confirmed to be playing the role on 6 July 2010.

With the start of the [[Season 3|third season]], Luke McEwan was credited as "Luke Barnes". His Twitter name was changed to "Luke Barnes (McEwan)" at the same time.
